equinox.task

Interface AutomaticTaskOwner<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Output class.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddSpectrum, AddSTFFiles

    public interface AutomaticTaskOwner<V>
    Interface for automatic task owner tasks. These tasks execute the automatic tasks after their process is complete.
    Author:
    Murat Artim
    Date:
    24 Jan 2017
    Time:
    14:21:05

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAutomaticTask(java.lang.String taskID, AutomaticTask<V> task)
      Adds automatic task.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,AutomaticTask<V>> getAutomaticTasks()
      Returns a mapping containing the automatic tasks or null if no automatic tasks are defined.

    • Method Detail

      • addAutomaticTask

        void addAutomaticTask(java.lang.String taskID,
                      AutomaticTask<V> task)
        Adds automatic task.
        Parameters:
        taskID - Automatic task ID. This must be unique to the task added.
        task - Task to add.

      • getAutomaticTasks

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,AutomaticTask<V>> getAutomaticTasks()
        Returns a mapping containing the automatic tasks or null if no automatic tasks are defined.
        Returns:
        Mapping containing automatic tasks or null if no automatic tasks are defined.
